game.name: Plasma Attack
game.shortDescription: 플라즈마 공격 원수 및 업그레이드 무기의 떼거리 싸움,당신은 우주선을 제어하는 평면도와 액션 슈팅 게임이다. 다양한 상대와 싸워 레벨을 극복하고,공격을 피하고 흥미 진진한 우주 모험에서 강력한 보스와 싸우십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Plasma Attack is a top-down side scrolling shooter game where the character is a flying spaceship equipped with a base laser.

reviewHighlights.text: The well-known airplane in a new cover. Simple old school graphics, addictive gameplay. Pleased with the presence of bosses and a table with records.
classic 8-bit shooter with an airplane, as if you were back to school, and at recess you are sitting with friends playing on your phone
